install.name: E-Way Payments
install.author: RedTeam
install.description: This plugin enables standard E-Way payments

param.name: eway_live_gateway
param.label: Use EWay Live Gateway
param.description: Select Yes If you are using Live URLs , Use No is you are using testing URLs

param.name: eway_live_url
param.label: EWay Hosted Payments Live URL
param.description: The eWAY Merchant Hosted Payment solution allows you to post an XML document containing customer and payment information to the eWAY payment gateway. This allows customers' to remain on your website at all times, while processing occurs behind the scenes.

param.name: eway_cvn_live_url
param.label: EWay Merchant Hosted Payments CVN Live URL
param.description: Further minimise your risk of fraudulent transactions by authenticating your customerâ€™s credit card with CVN details during the payment process. The credit card CVN is a three digit verification number that is found on the back of a MasterCard or VISA credit card, or a four digit number for AMEX cards.

param.name: eway_cvn_testing_url
param.label: EWay Merchant Hosted Payments CVN Testing URL

param.name: eway_antifraud_live_url
param.label: EWay Beagle Anti-Fraud Live URL
param.description: Beagle uses GEO-IP rules to block or flag potential fraudulent transactions. Rules are declared within the eWAY Business Centre and notifications are sent via e-mail for any transactions that do not pass the Anti-Fraud rules. Beagle is integrated by passing two additional fields (IP address and country code) while using the Merchant Hosted Payment solution.

param.name: verify_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for successful transactions
param.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

param.name: invalid_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for failed transactions
param.description: Select an order status for failed payment transactions.

param.name: capture_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Capture Payment Status
param.description: Select an capture status for capturing payment.

param.name: economic_design_layout
param.label: Enter E-conomic Design and Layout ID
